description: Application under Section 191 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 for a Certificate of Lawfulness of Existing Development to confirm that the development has commenced lawfully in relation to application Ref: A2017/76969/FUL dated of 21st April 2017 has begun prior to the expiration date of the permission.
